{include "default_salutation"} –

This week, we received devastating news about the Supreme Court's intent to trample Roe v. Wade and erode protections for abortion and healthcare freedom.

This makes our fight for these rights in Kansas even more vital.

The Vote NO campaign is being led by the Kansans for Constitutional Freedom to stop the proposed Constitutional amendment that would open the door to erode abortion rights in Kansas.

The campaign needs your help.

On Saturday, May 14, the coalition will kick off our grassroots voter contact program with a day of action and community canvasses. We ask you to do your part and sign up to volunteer.
